sentences.sContent: Mr. Redzepi among his cooks in the densely staffed Noma kitchen. The two cooks in the foreground are preparing a steak tartare dish.
sentences.sContent_eng: Mr. Redzepi among his cooks in the densely staffed Noma kitchen. The two cooks in the foreground are preparing a steak tartare dish.
sentences.sCn: 雷哲毕和他的厨师们在诺玛餐厅的厨房里忙碌着，位于照片前景的两位厨师正在准备鞑靼牛排

sentences.sContent: The sight of a Frenchman wolfing down a steak tartare (chopped up or minced raw meat) has shocked many a newly-arrived foreigner in France.
sentences.sContent_eng: The sight of a Frenchman wolfing down a steak tartare (chopped up or minced raw meat) has shocked many a newly-arrived foreigner in France.
sentences.sCn: 看到一个法国人吃下一个鞑靼牛排（切碎或绞碎的生肉）震惊了许多新来法国的外国人。

trans.tranOther: steak that is cut into very small pieces and eaten raw, usually with a raw egg
